oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Benefit for Tom Cerone
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bailey, Razzy; Split fountain printing;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color window card (split fountain, red to green, on white) announcing a Benefit for Tom "The Hit Man" Cerone featuring Razzy Bailey, Delicious Blues Stew, Mike Dunbar, Ricky and Ronnie Godfrey, John Richards, Mike Holloway, and Jim Sales with M.C. Shannon Williford and guest auctioneer Christine Meador at the Blues and Boogie Bar in Nashville, Tennessee on May 7.
